title: 315. Andy & DJ CTI: Eric Greitens' Hunting Ad, Lia Thomas Banned By FINA & Disney's Lightyear Flops
itunes:title: 315. Andy & DJ CTI: Eric Greitens' Hunting Ad, Lia Thomas Banned By FINA & Disney's Lightyear Flops
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Eric Greitens' new RINO hunting campaign ad that has enraged critics across social media, Lia Thomas' dominance over female competitors coming to an end after being banned by FINA, and Disney's Lightyear flopping over a controversial lesbian kiss in its opening weekend.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Eric Greitens' new RINO hunting campaign ad that has enraged critics across social media, Lia Thomas' dominance over female competitors coming to an end after being banned by FINA, and Disney's Lightyear flopping over a controversial lesbian kiss in its opening weekend.
